author: Special Correspondent
text:
A life-convict reportedly committed suicide in the Central Prison, Cuddalore, on Sunday.

Dhanasekar (58), who was lodged in the prison since 2006, was found hanging from the ceiling on a dhothi.

He was convicted and sentenced to life imprisonment by a trial court in 2003 for murder.

Investigating officials said other prisoners found him hanging from the ceiling and informed jail authorities who rushed him to Government General Hospital where the doctors declared him brought dead.

Cuddalore police registered a case the under section 176 of the Criminal Procedure Code

The cause of death will be known only after magisterial enquiry which will be followed immediately.
title: Life convict commits suicide in Cuddalore
